response.overview: Shouting with the cry "if it feels good do it!" The era of free love in the 1960's unleashed a decade of the most promiscuous pussy since the dawn of civilization. Now see it in all it's uncensored glory as Historic Erotica presents "Hippies In Heat". Return with us now to those thrilling days of sex, , rock and roll and birth control pills, as long haired, dewey eyed ladies and their partners engage in sex acts so decadent as to be unimaginable in today's society. You'll gasp with envy at every pulse pounding moment of unchecked sexual frenzy as you experience the revolutionary gropings of those shameless "Hippies In Heat".
response.title: Hippies in Heat
